testcase.name: Apply Leave in OrangeHRM
testcase.system-out: Given i login into the OrangeHRM site.......................................passed Then i enter the usrename and password......................................passed Then i click on the login button............................................passed Given user clicks on the Leave in the left panel............................passed Then user clicks on the Apply tab...........................................passed Then user selects the leave dates...........................................passed Then user saves the leave...................................................passed
